dimensions: Warp x Weft: 53 x 26 cm (20 7/8 x 10 1/4 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Deep red velvet with offset repeat pattern of gold disks.  The foundation weave is a plain weave formed by a red silk warp and tan silk weft.  The supplementary warp pile is a deep red silk.  The velvet pile is voided in the areas where the coin dots appear, and supplementary gold wefts are floated in pairs to the surface in these areas, bound in twill with the secondary ivory warp.
name: Textile
